name: object-crumble
description: Creative ways to cook your object

scripts.doc: npx typedoc --json report/doc.json --pretty src/index.ts && npx baldrick-doc-ts typedoc --json-source report/doc.json
scripts.md: baldrick markdown check && baldrick markdown check -s .github/
scripts.md:fix: baldrick markdown fix && baldrick markdown fix -s .github/
scripts.ready: yarn lint && yarn test:cov && yarn md && yarn outdated && yarn audit
scripts.norm: npx baldrick-ts generate -f lib -ga 'flarebyte' -ch 'Flarebyte.com' -cy 2021 -l MIT -b object-crumble && yarn md:fix
scripts.norm:g: baldrick-ts generate -f lib -ga 'flarebyte' -ch 'Flarebyte.com' -cy 2021 -l MIT -b object-crumble && yarn md:fix
